abstract: A floor mat on the driver’s side could interfere with the vehicle’s accelerator and cause a crash, Toyota said.
snippet: A floor mat on the driver’s side could interfere with the vehicle’s accelerator and cause a crash, Toyota said.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota said on Tuesday that it would recall 3.8 million vehicles because a floor mat could cause the accelerator pedal to become stuck. But for now, the automaker and federal officials are urging owners to simply remove their driver’s side mat while Toyota works out a solution.

headline.print_headline: After Accident, Toyota Is to Recall 3.8 Million Vehicles Over a Floor Mat Flaw
